name: Healthyfied Potato Vegetable Salad
description: Dive into a bowl of Healthyfied Potato Vegetable Salad, a delight for anyone looking to enjoy a high-fiber, nutritious meal. Crafted with an assortment of fresh vegetables and seasoned to perfection, this salad epitomizes the essence of healthy living through 'Healthyfied' and 'Healthified Recipes'. It's a perfect choice for those seeking a refreshing, hearty meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the Garlic Marble Potatoes, Carrots, Cabbage, Eggplant, and Yellow raw under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the Carrots, Cabbage, Eggplant, and Yellow raw, and mince the Garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the Garlic Marble Potatoes in a pot of water until they are tender, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In another pot, blanch the diced Carrots, Cabbage, and Eggplant for about 5 minutes, then drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the boiled potatoes, blanched vegetables, minced garlic in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mayonnaise, ground pepper, and lemon juice to the bowl. Mix well until all the ingredients are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
